thread.title: Marseille to make ambitious move to re-sign Dimitri Payet from West Ham in January transfer window for £30million
thread.title_full: Marseille to make ambitious move to re-sign Dimitri Payet from West Ham in January transfer window for £30million

author: arichardson
title: Marseille to make ambitious move to re-sign Dimitri Payet from West Ham in January transfer window for £30million
text:
EFL payet up Marseille to make ambitious move to re-sign Dimitri Payet from West Ham in January transfer window for £30million 
Frenchman's form has dipped this season, but his class is not in doubt — and the Hammers will fight to keep hold of midfielder By ANDREW RICHARDSON
